pages.title: Turn Around
pages.text: $(bold)Turn Around$() is a simple command you can teach your Pet Rock™.$(br2)Commonly used as a dance to attract prospective mates, rocks in the world will often stand in place and spin slowly.$(br2)While you can teach your Pet Rock™ to perform this action on command, it is not recommended to do so as it

may interfere with their ability to find a potential mates in the future.$(br2)Should you wish to observe this wondrous ballet, you can place a second Pet Rock™ near the first. If the rocks are attracted to one another, they will begin spinning together.$(br2)There is no need to worry about accidental breeding. Rocks will only procreate when food is nearby and plentiful.
